content:
ServiceMetadataPublishingElement Class

Definition

Represents the configuration element that controls the publication of service metadata and associated information. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public sealed class ServiceMetadataPublishingElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement
Inheritance
Object
ConfigurationElement
ServiceModelConfigurationElement
ServiceModelExtensionElement
BehaviorExtensionElement
ServiceMetadataPublishingElement

Examples

<serviceMetadata>

Remarks

This configuration element can be used to enable or disable the publication of service metadata using an HTTP/Get request or a WS-MetadataExchange (WS-MEX) request. You can also enable or prevent the display of an HTML page of information about the service when it is requested over HTTP.

Constructors

ServiceMetadataPublishingElement()

Initializes a new instance of the ServiceMetadataPublishingElement class.

public ServiceMetadataPublishingElement ();

Properties

BehaviorType

Gets the type of this behavior configuration element.

public override Type BehaviorType { get; }
Value
Type

A Type, the value is the type of ServiceMetadataBehavior.

ExternalMetadataLocation

Gets or sets a string that contains the location of service metadata.

public Uri ExternalMetadataLocation { get; set; }
Value
Uri

A URI that specifies the location of a WSDL file, which is returned to the user in response to WSDL and MEX requests instead of the auto-generated WSDL. The default is a null Uri object.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Remarks

When this property is not set, the auto-generated WSDL is returned.

HttpGetBinding

A string value that specifies the name of the binding to be used for metadata retrieval in HTTP GET scenarios.

public string HttpGetBinding { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

Remarks

If this property is not set, the default binding (HttpsTransportBindingElement) is used for metadata retrieval as appropriate.

HttpGetBindingConfiguration

Gets or sets a string that points to an XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceMetadataPublishingElement.HttpGetBinding*.

public string HttpGetBindingConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

HttpGetEnabled

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to publish service metadata for retrieval using an HTTP/Get request.

public bool HttpGetEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the service metadata is published for retrieval using an HTTP/Get request; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Remarks

If the HttpGetUrl property is not specified, the address at which the metadata is published is the service address plus a "?wsdl". For example, if the service address is "http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService", the HTTP/Get metadata address is "http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl".

If this property is false, or the address of the service is not based on HTTP or HTTPS, “?wsdl” is ignored.

HttpGetUrl

Gets or sets a URI that specifies the address at which the metadata is published for retrieval using an HTTP/Get request.

public Uri HttpGetUrl { get; set; }
Value
Uri

A URI that specifies the address at which the metadata is published.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

HttpsGetBinding

A string value that specifies the name of the binding to be used for metadata retrieval in HTTPS GET scenarios.

public string HttpsGetBinding { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

Remarks

If this property is not set, the default binding (HttpsTransportBindingElement) is used for metadata retrieval as appropriate.

HttpsGetBindingConfiguration

Gets or sets a string that points to an XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in stem.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceMetadataPublishingElement.HttpsGetBinding*.

public string HttpsGetBindingConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns String.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

HttpsGetEnabled

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to publish service metadata for retrieval using an HTTPS/Get request.

public bool HttpsGetEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the service metadata is published for retrieval using an HTTP/Get request; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Remarks

If the HttpsGetUrl property is not specified, the address at which the metadata is published is the service address plus a "?wsdl". For example, if the service address is "https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService", the HTTP/Get metadata address is "https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl".

If this property is false, or the address of the service is not based on HTTP or HTTPS, “?wsdl” is ignored.

HttpsGetUrl

Gets or sets a URI that specifies the address at which the metadata is published for retrieval using an HTTPS/Get request.

public Uri HttpsGetUrl { get; set; }
Value
Uri

A URI that specifies the address at which the metadata is published for retrieval using an HTTPS/Get request.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

PolicyVersion

Gets or sets a value that specifies the version of the WS-Policy specification being used.

public System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyVersion PolicyVersion { get; set; }
Value
PolicyVersion

A valid value of PolicyVersion that specifies the version of the WS-Policy specification being used.

Attributes
TypeConverterAttribute ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Properties 

protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }
Value
ConfigurationPropertyCollection

To be added.

from

The configuration element to be copied.
